but with new emphasis on the

Out of the Shades
He made an interesting remark about Kennedy's intervention for a neutral Laos,

United States must "function

young nations may choose freely."

never smiling as he mentioned
the growing spirit of compromise in outer space diplomacy,

after all the brotherhood was
said and done, Mr. Thant reminded the audience, "that no

of the United Nations.

McCoy College
Offers Courses
For New Degree
Dean Richard Mumma of McCoy College this week announced
a new program of graduate
studies in the college leading to
the Degree of Master of Liberal
Arts.
According to Dean Mumma
"the program is planned for
those whose baccalaureate degree
were taken in such areas as
business, education, and engineering as well as for liberal
arts major.

Non-Vocational
The dean stressed the nonvocational nature of the new
degree which is the first of its
kind in the couptry. "The purpose of the program is to provide the equivalent of a years
advanced study in the Liberal
Arts for the purpose of enabling
adults to acquire broader knowledge, deeper insight, and greater understanding of man's cultural heritage and the social,
political, and scientific aspects
of contemporary society."
The program will emphasize
the history of ideas. Neither an
essay nor a knowledge of a foreign language will be required. ,
Requirements Set
Applicants for admission to
the program must hold a
bachelor's degree from an approved college or university with
an .average of "B" or better in
the latter half of their undergraduate program.
So far a total of one hundred
sixty-eight persons have enrolled
in the program. According to
Dean Mumma they represent
over eighteen different occupations including doctors, judges,
engineers, teachers and internal
revenue agents.

"Wide Appeal"
"The program seems to have
had a very wide appeal," commented Dean Mumma. "I estimated that the first year we
would have about thirty people.
Actually we've had over six
times that many and have had
to turn away quite a few.

"square' to admit it. Like, man,

"out" people who say it swings.

with the minority. I'm confident
that you haven't turned now.

analytical context of the University, he was able to make
a relatively abstract statement of his vitally
important

"square' to admit it. Like, man,
